name: Netvibes - Cleanup clutter (top bar, unread, ...)
description:
Cleanup a few Netvibes items : 

Make top bar auto-toggle on mouseover instead of taking up space
Hide read RSS items as a 1 pixel horizontal line 
Reduce vertical space taken up by "next" button and tabs
Remove ugly logo text on bottom

(Top bar CSS was included from http://userstyles.org/styles/5566 in order to have only one style for Netvibes)
